<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2144</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grammar exercises:Rewording sentences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsätze der Grammatik exercises:Rewording</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Phrases de la grammaire exercises:Rewording</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentenças da gramática exercises:Rewording</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frasi di grammatica exercises:Rewording</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προτάσεις γραμματικής exercises:Rewording</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sentencias de la gramática exercises:Rewording</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are grammar exercises for matriculation English students where they are required to reword sentences.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rewording</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sentences</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind Grammatikübungen für matriculation 
englische Kursteilnehmer, in denen sie reword Programmsätze benoetigt
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont des exercices de grammaire pour les 
étudiants anglais d'immatriculation où elles sont exigées pour 
reformuler des phrases.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes são exercícios da gramática para os 
estudantes ingleses do matriculation onde são requeridas para 
reformular sentenças.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste sono esercitazioni di grammatica per gli 
allievi inglesi di matriculation in cui sono richieste per ripetere le
frasi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές είναι ασκήσεις γραμματικής για τους αγγλικούς 
σπουδαστές εγγραφής όπου πρέπει για να επαναλάβουν τις 
προτάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstos son ejercicios de la gramática para los 
estudiantes ingleses del matriculation donde se requieren para repetir
sentencias.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rewording</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Programmsätze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">reformuler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phrases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reformular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentenças</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ripetizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frasi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επανάληψη</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
